ShippingManagement.pageDescription: Create, edit and manage shipping profiles here.

rateName.label: Rate Name
rateName.description: Rates are shown to customers as delivery options during checkout.

ShippingProfileEmptyState.title: Create a shipping profile to get started!

DeleteShippingProfileModal.title: Delete Shipping Profile
DeleteShippingProfileModal.description: Are you sure you want to delete this shipping profile? It will be permanently removed and this action cannot be undone.

DuplicateShippingProfileModal.title: Duplicate Shipping Profile
DuplicateShippingProfileModal.description: Are you sure you want to duplicate this shipping profile?

AddRateButton.title: Add New Rate
AddRateButton.description: Add options and rates for this zone.

ShippingProfileName.label: Profile Name
ShippingProfileName.description: Keep shipping profiles uniquely identifiable by name. This will not be visible to customers.

DeleteShippingRateModal.title: Delete Shipping Rate
DeleteShippingRateModal.description: Are you sure you want to delete this shipping rate? It will be permanently removed and this action cannot be undone.

DeleteShippingZoneModal.title: Delete Shipping Zone
DeleteShippingZoneModal.description: Are you sure you want to delete this shipping zone? It will be permanently removed and this action cannot be undone.

validation.atLeastOneZone: At least one shipping zone is required.
validation.zoneServicesRequired: Each zone must have at least one shipping service.
validation.zoneEstimatedDeliveryRequired: Each zone requires estimated delivery days.
